name: Must've Been The Wind
description:
You play as a thief who has been cursed to drop high explosives every few seconds. Thankfully, you've maximized your stealth stat, so the guards are none the wiser. So keep chucking, keep bamboozlin gand keep stealing!

Made in 5 days, this was just a small project. Special thanks to ZapSplat for the great music., and o_lobster for heavy inspiration on the tileset.
